meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of December 12, 2023 Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Charter Review Commission Amendment Review Schedule and Process
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the schedule and process for reviewing proposed amendments.

agenda_items.title: Allow the City Manager to submit an estimated budget
agenda_items.description: Amendment to allow submission of the budget by August 15th instead of on August 15th.

agenda_items.title: Amend City Council candidate residency requirements
agenda_items.description: Amendment to align residency requirements with the Election Code.

agenda_items.title: Delete requirement for city secretary verification
agenda_items.description: Amendment to remove the verification requirement for filed affidavits of residency.

agenda_items.title: Add provision for alternate deadlines
agenda_items.description: Amendment to allow alternate deadlines when the last day falls on a weekend or holiday.

agenda_items.title: Amend provision related to council members paying taxes
agenda_items.description: Amendment to clarify tax liabilities for city council members.

agenda_items.title: Amend language for accruing liens
agenda_items.description: Amendment to allow the city to accrue liens on a monthly basis.

agenda_items.title: Amend personnel appeal deadline
agenda_items.description: Amendment to align appeal deadlines with personnel rules.

agenda_items.title: Revise language on probationary periods
agenda_items.description: Amendment to clarify that civilian probationary periods do not satisfy sworn service requirements.

agenda_items.title: Remove voter registration requirement for petitions
agenda_items.description: Amendment to eliminate the voter registration requirement for petitions.
